contradictions.description: Score stuck at 75/100 for 10 consecutive reviews — supervisor may be inventing new issues each time

report.recommendation: WARN — some issues detected, monitor closely next sprint

ceoDecision:

Bad: FE-031 stuck at exactly 75/100 for 10 consecutive attempts suggests moving goalposts - supervisor likely inventing new issues each time instead of checking if previous feedback was addressed. This wasted an entire task and forced manual completion.",
```json
    "improvement_requirements": [
      "Must track which issues were raised in previous attempts and verify they were fixed before raising new ones",

```

**Action Items for Next Sprint:**
1. Monitor FE tasks closely - if supervisor shows same moving goalposts pattern on 2+ tasks, escalate to TERMINATE
2. Log this warning to `reports/supervisor-performance/warning-week-10.md`
3. Include improvement requirements in next sprint briefing
4. If performance doesn't improve by week-11, prepare termination with enhanced prompt focusing on consistency and feedback tracking

The supervisor gets ONE more sprint to prove they can avoid the moving goalposts trap. The 75/100 × 10 pattern on FE-031 is exactly the kind of waste that kills sprint velocity.
